items.title: Labour discontent grows at Hyundai’s Chennai plant: Report
items.description: The automobile major at present recognises the United Union of Hyundai Employees (UUHE) as the official negotiating body.

items.title: Indira IVF acquires Ahmedabad-based Banker IVF to expand fertility care services
items.description: The collaboration will increase Indira IVF's presence in Gujarat, adding to its existing centers in Ahmedabad, Vadodara, Rajkot, Mehsana, and other key locations, the company said.

items.title: Warburg Pincus said to be in talks to sell stake in SBI General Insurance
items.description: Premji Invest and New York-based Warburg Pincus agreed to buy 16.01% and 9.99% of SBI General Insurance, respectively, in 2019 from Insurance Australia Group Ltd. in a transaction that was completed in 2020.

items.title: India to tap abandoned oil wells for geothermal energy
items.description: India has at least 13,348 abandoned oil wells with a potential of about 10,600 MW of geothermal power. But it has not exploited even 1 MW so far.

items.title: Biocon’s Rs 4,500 crore QIP to help retire debt, fuel new launches, says CEO Sidharth Mittal
items.description: Biocon’s debt profile has been under investor scrutiny after a strategic acquisition of Viatris Inc's biosimilars business for roughly $3.3 billion in 2022. This deal, while transformative for Biocon Biologics, had significantly increased the company's leverage.

items.title: Bharat Forge bags L1 status in Army's tender to supply CQB carbines designed by DRDO
items.description: The size of the order is not officially known, however, some news reports have pegged it at close to Rs 2,000 crore, potentially making it the biggest single order for carbines since the induction of the INSAS files more than decades ago.

items.title: Why 10% of your capital budget should be allocated to AI experiments
items.description: Allocate 10% to AI experiments now, not for hype, but to build lasting capability, unlock real value, and stay competitive in a world where applied intelligence is rapidly becoming ubiquitous

items.title: Optimism low on this healthcare stock
items.description: Medanta has strong capabilities to leverage its brand image. However, near-term growth looks limited

items.title: From Lead to Lithium: This battery maker is building the next growth engine
items.description: Strong lead-acid cash flows anchor the transition as Amara Raja builds vertical capabilities in lithium, energy storage, and grid solutions

items.title: Building soft power: How TCS, Infosys are investing big bucks in their brands
items.description: TCS sponsors prestigious marathons while Infosys stepped up branding activity in tennis events
